entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
